ended.note: Notified Government of Uruguay from Buenos Aires that his successor had been appointed by note on

appointed.note: Commission enclosed with an instruction on

chief.note: Commission (issued during a recess of the Senate) was not of record. Although later confirmed by the Senate, Kirk was apparently not recommissioned after confirmation.

started.note: No record found of presentation of credentials; acknowledged receipt of his commission on

chief.note: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on January 13, 1886, after confirmation.

ended.note: Promoted to Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary

chief.note: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate.
Also accredited to Paraguay; resident at Montevideo.

Not commissioned; nomination to be Chargé d’Affaires to Paraguay and Uruguay withdrawn before the Senate acted upon it.
Took oath of office, but did not proceed to post.
